title: Chapter 975 - Leaving Them All In The Dust
body:
Chapter 975 - Leaving Them All In The Dust

Su Yi’s voice had yet to finish echoing through the air when two more figures appeared out of nowhere.

One was a tall, stalwart man in robes embroidered with dragons. He had a mustache shaped like a halberd, and his features were coarse. His entire body was wrapped in densely concentrated arcs of silver lightning.

The other was a moving beauty in colorful palace garb. As she looked around, her gaze was utterly dignified.

Two more Profound Serenity experts!

Su Yi wasn’t overly surprised by this. Shortly after his arrival in the Burial Ground of the Dao, he learned from Nine-Star Sword Mountain’s Fu Donghua that the forces the Abstruse Alliance had sent on this mission included four Profound Serenity powerhouses. When he saw these four, their auras alone were enough for him to discern their origins.

The dark-robed elder with the fly whisk was from Dragon Tiger Dao Mountain.

The golden-robed man was from Nine-Star Sword Mountain.

The man with a halberd-shaped beard was from the Divine Blue Lightning Sect.

And the beautiful woman in palace garb was from the Cloud-Scraping Yao Sect!

Dragon Tiger Dao Mountain, Nine-Star Sword Mountain, and the Divine Blue Lightning Sect were...
original_title: Chapter 975 - Leaving Them All in the Dust
